018package org.tquadrat.shootingtimer;
019
020import static java.lang.System.err;
021import static javafx.application.Platform.exit;
022import static javafx.scene.input.KeyCombination.NO_MATCH;
023import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.I18nUtil.loadResourceBundle;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.EMPTY_STRING;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.DebugOutput.ifDebug;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.isNull;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
030
031import java.util.NoSuchElementException;
032import java.util.ResourceBundle;
033
034import org.apiguardian.api.API;
035import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
036import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ProgramClass;
037import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.ApplicationError;
038import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.UnexpectedExceptionError;
039import org.tquadrat.foundation.fx.SceneUserData;
040import org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.BaseBundleName;
041import org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.I18nUtil;
042import org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.Message;
043import org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.MessagePrefix;
044import org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.Translation;
045import javafx.application.Application;
046import javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader;
047import javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane;
048import javafx.stage.Stage;
049
050/**
051 *  The main class for the Shooting Timer application.
052 *
053 *  @version $Id: Main.java 106 2022-01-19 15:53:24Z tquadrat $
054 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
055 *  @UMLGraph.link
056 *  @since 0.1.0
057 */
058@ProgramClass
059@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: Main.java 106 2022-01-19 15:53:24Z tquadrat $" )
060@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
061public class Main extends Application
062{
063        /*-----------*\
064    ====** Constants **========================================================
065        \*-----------*/
066    /**
067     *  The base bundle name, used for the texts and messages: {@value}.
068     */
069    @BaseBundleName
070    public static final String BASE_BUNDLE_NAME = "TxtMsg";
071
072    /**
073     *  The message prefix for the messages: {@value}.
074     */
075    @MessagePrefix
076    public static final String MESSAGE_PREFIX = "ST";
077
078    /**
079     *  Message: {@value}.
080     */
081    public static final String MSG_CannotLoadTextResources = "Unable to locate text resources";
082
083    /**
084     *  The message key for the message: &quot;Unable to load CSS
085     *  stylesheet.&quot;.
086     */
087    @Message
088    (
089        description = "The resource with the CSS stylesheet cannot be found",
090        translations =
091            {
092                @Translation( language = "de", text = "Das Stylesheet '%1$s' kann nicht geladen werden" ),
093                @Translation( language = "en", text = "Unable to load the stylesheet '%1$s'" )
094            }
095    )
096    public static final int MSGKEY_CannotLoadStylesheet = 1;
097
098    /**
099     *  The message key for the message: &quot;Unable to load UI
100     *  definition.&quot;.
101     */
102    @Message
103        (
104            description = "The resource with the FXML cannot be found",
105            translations =
106                {
107                    @Translation( language = "de", text = "Die UI-Definitionsdatei '%1$s' kann nicht geladen werden" ),
108                    @Translation( language = "en", text = "Unable to load the UI definitions file '%1$s'" )
109                }
110        )
111    public static final int MSGKEY_CannotLoadUIDefinition = 2;
112
113        /*---------*\
114    ====** Methods **==========================================================
115        \*---------*/
116    /**
117     *  The program entry point.
118     *
119     *  @param  args    The command line arguments.
120     */
121    public static final void main( final String... args )
122    {
123        try
124        {
125            launch( args );
126        }
127        catch( final Throwable t )
128        {
129            //---* Handle any previously unhandled exceptions *----------------
130            t.printStackTrace( err );
131        }
132    }   //  main()
133
134    /**
135     *  <p>{@summary Retrieves the message with the given key from the given
136     *  resource bundle and applies the given arguments to it.}</p>
137     *  <p>If the resource bundle does not contain a message for the given key,
138     *  the key itself will be returned, appended with the arguments.</p>
139     *
140     *  @param  bundle  The resource bundle.
141     *  @param  messageKey  The id for the message.
142     *  @param  args    The arguments for the message.
143     *  @return The text.
144     */
145    public final String retrieveMessage( final ResourceBundle bundle, final int messageKey, final Object... args )
146    {
147        final var retValue = I18nUtil.retrieveMessage( requireNonNullArgument( bundle, "bundle" ), MESSAGE_PREFIX, messageKey, true, args );
148
149        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
150        return retValue;
151    }   //  retrieveMessage()
152
153    /**
154     *  {@inheritDoc}
155     *
156     *  @see javafx.application.Application#start(javafx.stage.Stage)
157     */
158    @Override
159    public final void start( final Stage primaryStage )
160    {
161        try
162        {
163            //---* Display the physical screen size *--------------------------
164//            out.println( "Screen Size" );
165//            final Screen screen = Screen.getPrimary();
166//            final Rectangle2D primaryScreenBounds = screen.getBounds();
167//            final Rectangle2D primaryScreenBoundsVisual = screen.getVisualBounds();
168//            out.printf( "width  = %6.0f/%6.0f\n", primaryScreenBounds.getWidth(), primaryScreenBoundsVisual.getWidth() );
169//            out.printf( "Min x  = %6.0f/%6.0f\n", primaryScreenBounds.getMinX(), primaryScreenBoundsVisual.getMinX() );
170//            out.printf( "Max x  = %6.0f/%6.0f\n", primaryScreenBounds.getMaxX(), primaryScreenBoundsVisual.getMaxX() );
171//            out.printf( "height = %6.0f/%6.0f\n", primaryScreenBounds.getHeight(), primaryScreenBoundsVisual.getHeight() );
172//            out.printf( "Min y  = %6.0f/%6.0f\n", primaryScreenBounds.getMinY(), primaryScreenBoundsVisual.getMinY() );
173//            out.printf( "Max y  = %6.0f/%6.0f\n", primaryScreenBounds.getMaxY(), primaryScreenBoundsVisual.getMaxY() );
174
175            //---* Load the resource bundle with the texts *-------------------
176            final var textURL = getClass().getResource( "/" + BASE_BUNDLE_NAME.replace( '.', '/' ) + ".properties" );
177            //noinspection ConstantConditions
178            ifDebug( nonNull( textURL ), $ -> textURL.toExternalForm() );
179            ifDebug( isNull( textURL ), "Not found %s%n"::formatted, "/" + BASE_BUNDLE_NAME.replace( '.', '/' ) + ".properties" );
180
181            ResourceBundle.getBundle( BASE_BUNDLE_NAME );
182
183            final var resources = loadResourceBundle( BASE_BUNDLE_NAME )
184                .orElseThrow( () -> new ApplicationError( MSG_CannotLoadTextResources ) );
185
186            //---* Create the main window *------------------------------------
187            final var fxmlFileName = "Main.fxml";
188            final var fxmlURL = getClass().getResource( fxmlFileName );
189            if( isNull( fxmlURL ) )
190            {
191                throw new ApplicationError( retrieveMessage( resources, MSGKEY_CannotLoadUIDefinition, fxmlFileName ) );
192            }
193            final BorderPane root = FXMLLoader.load( fxmlURL, resources );
194
195            //---* Create the scene *------------------------------------------
196            final var scene = SceneUserData.createScene( this, primaryStage, root );
197            final var userdata = SceneUserData.retrieveUserData( scene, Main.class )
198                .orElseThrow( () -> new UnexpectedExceptionError( new NoSuchElementException() ) );
199
200            //---* Add the style sheet to the scene *--------------------------
201            final var cssFileName = "application.css";
202            final var cssURL = getClass().getResource( cssFileName );
203            if( isNull( cssURL ) )
204            {
205                throw new ApplicationError( retrieveMessage( resources, MSGKEY_CannotLoadStylesheet, cssFileName ) );
206            }
207            scene.getStylesheets().add( cssURL.toExternalForm() );
208            userdata.setApplicationCSS( cssURL );
209
210            //---* Configure the stage *---------------------------------------
211            primaryStage.centerOnScreen();
212            primaryStage.setFullScreen( true );
213            primaryStage.setFullScreenExitHint( EMPTY_STRING );
214            primaryStage.setFullScreenExitKeyCombination( NO_MATCH );
215
216            //---* Show the stage *--------------------------------------------
217            primaryStage.show();
218        }
219        catch( final Throwable t )
220        {
221            //---* Handle any previously unhandled exceptions *----------------
222            t.printStackTrace( err );
223            exit();
224        }
225    }
226    //  start()
227}
228//  class Main
229
230/*
231 *  End of File
232 */
